Ice Poseidon TV - Changelog
Full detailed commit history: https://github.com/ansien12/Ice-Poseidon-TV/commits/master

4.2.1 (03/10/2017): Chat colors fixed
4.2.0 (03/10/2017): Updated Twitch emotes api to v3
4.1.9 (15/09/2017): Embed chat fixes
4.1.8 (15/09/2017): Temporary fix for popout chat changes.
4.1.7 (13/09/2017): Added legacy LUL emote.
4.1.5 (15/08/2017): Cx Live bug fixes.
4.1.4 (15/08/2017): Added Cx Live embed.
4.1.3 (31/07/2017): Added new Tier 3 subscriber emote (purpleTroll).
4.1.2 (19/07/2017): Fixed bug where image alt caused massive walls of text.
4.1.1 (12/07/2017): More loading improvements.
4.1.0 (10/07/2017): Fixed slowdown on YouTube and other bug fixes.
4.0.8 (02/07/2017): Minor optimizations and cleanup.
4.0.7 (27/06/2017): Updated github version.
4.0.5 (14/06/2017): Sponsor related bug fixes.
4.0.1 (14/06/2017): Name color option fix.
4.0.0 (10/06/2017): Super secret big update.
3.0.1 (26/05/2017): Reverted TriHard emotes changes.
3.0.0 (21/05/2017): Rewrote content script to ES6.
2.7.1 (21/05/2017): Added warning when not watching live.
2.7.0 (21/05/2017): Reworked 'Always sroll down' functionality, fixed parts of IPTV code loading on wrong pages, fixed several typos, fixed twitter widget overflowing and added view counter.
2.6.2 (19/05/2017): Firefox bug fixes, fixed extension loading in irrelevant iframes/pages, added BTTV mention style option.
2.6.1 (14/05/2017): Firefox loading fix.
2.6.0 (14/05/2017): Firefox release.
2.5.1 (14/05/2017): Fixed wrong file path external script.
2.5.0 (14/05/2017): Added back Ice's old sub emotes, added donate button next to sponsor button, fixed chat message menu and fixed delay on chat message color change.
2.4.1 (10/05/2017): Firefox preperations.
2.4.0 (09/05/2017): Added toggleable seperators between chat messages and (temp) fixed high RAM consumption.
2.3.2 (08/05/2017): Fix pop out height when tweet embed disabled.
2.3.1 (08/05/2017): Styling changes and better tweet embed.
2.3.0 (08/05/2017): Fixed extension not working in popout chat.
2.2.6 (07/05/2017): Check if emotes loaded or not.
2.2.5 (07/05/2017): Make mod messages stand out more in chat.
2.2.4 (07/05/2017): Fixed options page not saving changes.
2.2.3 (07/05/2017): Fixed 'Loading' text showing up all over YouTube.
2.2.1 (07/05/2017): Remade the changelog and added link to it.
2.2.0 (07/05/2017): Rewrote how emotes are loaded in content script, extension should run a lot smoother now.
2.0.1 (06/05/2017): Fixed disappearing emotes.
2.0.0 (06/05/2017): Prepared codebase for Firefox support.
1.9.0 (06/05/2017): Show warning if not watching on gaming.youtube site.
1.8.0 (06/05/2017): Custom sounds, wrong page warning and slight codebase cleanup.
1.6.2 (06/05/2017): Added tooltips to emotes.
1.6.1 (05/05/2017): Fixed Kappa emote and added always scroll down option to prevent blue arrow bug in chat.
1.6.0 (05/05/2017): Emotes! Twitch, BTTV and sub emotes have been added.
1.5.1 (05/05/2017): Added Discord, Github and VOD links.
1.5.0 (05/05/2017): Icon changes to green when live.
1.4.0 (05/05/2017): Show most recent tweet, link to twitter, options no longer reset on restart.
1.3.0 (04/05/2017): Made own API for checking if Ice is live to avoid the extension being rate limited.
1.2.0 (04/05/2017): Notification sound effect option added.
